original_text: We took their land and we gave it to the tribes of Reuben, Gad and half the tribe of Manasseh. That would be their new home.
korean_text: 그 땅을 차지하여 르우벤과 갓과 므낫세 반 지파에게 기업으로 주었나니

sentences.original_text: and we gave it to the tribes of Reuben, Gad
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그것을 르우벤, 갓 지파에게 주었으며

sentences.original_text: and half the tribe of Manasseh
That would be their new home
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들의 새로운 집이 될 것이었다
